document.title: My First Blog Post
document.description: A simple introduction to my blog

body.raw:
# Welcome to My Blog

This is my first blog post using MDX. It allows me to mix **markdown** and _React components_.

## Key Points

- Markdown is easy to write
- MDX adds superpowers to markdown
- Contentlayer makes content management simple

## Code Example

```javascript
function greet(name) {
  return `Hello, ${name}!`;
}
```
body.html:
Welcome to My Blog

This is my first blog post using MDX. It allows me to mix markdown and React components.

Key Points

  • Markdown is easy to write
  • MDX adds superpowers to markdown
  • Contentlayer makes content management simple

Code Example

function greet(name) {
  return `Hello, ${name}!`;
}
